column4: Can anyone point me to a fglrx install howto that's worth a damn?  This is MUCH harder to install than it is on debian... I thought it was supposed to be backwards
Tweak, no, you can use dpkg -i --force-all on the 32bit deb
Do you really think it's a good idea to mix the packages like that?
I've done that on a 64bit dapper install, no problems, have to grab a few libraries, not much work though
